text:
convert
print(f"entry price: {self.vars.entry_price}")  
self.log_message(f"exit price: {last_price}")

to print messages
If you simply want both messages to be printed to the console instead of using a custom logging function, you can change the code as follows:

---------------------------------
print(f"entry price: {self.vars.entry_price}")
print(f"exit price: {last_price}")
---------------------------------

This way both the "entry price" and "exit price" messages appear on the console using Python's built-in print function.
